A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: So I went into this movie excited for the movie to pick-up from the Force Awakens due to my absolute love of Star Wars. The critics and early reviews sure had me fooled. The movie was absolute garbage. The storyline had to have been thought up by a 5 year old\, the character development was not present and this thing had more CGI than Attack of the Clones. I hated it. This movie was the worst thing since gravity in space and  hyperspace used as a weapon.
